Package org.cvs.application.api

Class WorkExperienceController

java.lang.Object
org.cvs.application.api.WorkExperienceController
@Controller
@RequestMapping(path="/experiences")
public class WorkExperienceController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • WorkExperienceController

      public WorkExperienceController()

  • Method Details

    • addNewApplicationWorkExperience

      @PostMapping(path="") @ResponseBody public WorkExperience addNewApplicationWorkExperience​(@RequestBody WorkExperience workExperience)
      Adds a new work experience entry to an existing candidate via POST through URL: /qualifications.

      Example payload: { "organisation": "SADF tkints", "position": "Test one", "country": "UK", "startDate": "2012-06-15", "endDate": "2017-09-15", "candidate": {"id": 111} }

      Parameters:
      workExperience - the work experience entry (can be a JSON payload) to be added to the system.
      Returns:
      the newly added work experience entry

    • getWorkExperience

      @GetMapping(path="/active/{workExperienceId}") @ResponseBody public WorkExperience getWorkExperience​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long workExperienceId)
      Fetches an active work experience entry via GET through URL: /experiences/active/{workExperienceId}.

      Example URL: /experiences/active/1

      Parameters:
      workExperienceId - the work experience ID as a request parameter to be used in the query
      Returns:
      an active work experience entry if found

    • deleteWorkExperience

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{workExperienceId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String deleteWorkExperience​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long workExperienceId)
      Deletes a work experience entry via DELETE method through base URL: /experiences/{workExperienceId}.

      Example URL: /experiences/1

      Parameters:
      workExperienceId - the ID of the work experience entry that is to be deleted from the system.
      Returns:
      a string that says 'Deleted'

    • retireWorkExperience

      @PostMapping(path="/retire/{workExperienceId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String retireWorkExperience​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long workExperienceId)
      Retires a work experience entry via POST through URL: /experiences/retire/{workExperienceId}.

      Example URL: /experiences/retire/1

      Parameters:
      workExperienceId - the ID of the work experience entry that is to be retired from the system.
      Returns:
      a string that says 'Retired'

    • getAllWorkExperiences

      @GetMapping(path="") @ResponseBody public java.lang.Iterable<WorkExperience> getAllWorkExperiences()
      Fetches all active work experience entries via GET through URL: /experiences.
      Returns:
      a list of all active work experience entries in JSON or XML

    • getWorkExperiences

      @GetMapping(path="/candidate/{candidateId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.Iterable<WorkExperience> getWorkExperiences​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long candidateId)
      Fetches active work experience entries for a particular candidate via GET through URL: /experiences/candidate/{candidateId}.
      Parameters:
      candidateId - the ID of the candidate ID to filter work experience entries for.
      Returns:
      a list of all active work experience entries for a particular candidate
